content.rendered:
Books By Dr. Rosado

  • Homepage
Award Winning Author


Dr. Rosado is a published author, sought-after speaker, and consultant, recognized for his groundbreaking contributions to the medical cannabis movement. His books are a definitive guide that blends scientific research, historical insights, and real patient experiences, empowering readers with truth, clarity, and practical knowledge.

Call or Text Us!
(888) 971-5577

Hope & Healing: The Case for Cannabis

Dr. Joseph Rosado’s book, “Hope & Healing: The Case for Cannabis,” is a must-read for anyone looking to understand the science, benefits, and real-world impact of medical cannabis. This book provides clear, practical insights for patients, healthcare providers, and those curious about cannabis-based treatments.

Why Read This Book?

Easy-to-understand explanations backed by medical expertise.
Real patient stories showcasing the power of cannabis in healing.
A doctor’s perspective on cannabis laws, treatments, and misconceptions.
Get Your Copy Today

5 Star Verified Amazon Reviews

This book has demystified and de-stigmatized the medical cannabis industry to me. Dr. Rosado has laid out a very well thought out and logically presented case for the legalization and use of medical marijuana. We have the solution to the opioid epidemic in this country. We have the treatment for epilepsy, PTSD, chronic pain and so much more. This book will reveal everything big pharma would hate for you to know. Take a read. Mind blowing!

Hermian Charles

Amazon Customer
This book is a fantastic read. It will educate you thoroughly on the science, history and practical applications of cannabis. You don’t have to be a doctor or scientist to get a great deal from this book, but you will feel smarter after reading it. Do yourself a favor and read this book. Your perspective on marijuana will likely be changed.

Sue D

Amazon Customer
Powerfully informative without being a medical report Highly recommended for anyone interested in Hope & Healing with Medical Cannabis

Amie Damonte

Amazon Customer

How To Get A Signed Copy of “Hope & Healing”

For readers who want a personalized touch, Dr. Joseph Rosado offers signed copies of “Hope & Healing: The Case for Cannabis.” Whether you’re a patient, medical professional, or advocate, a signed edition makes a great keepsake or gift for anyone interested in the science and benefits of medical cannabis.

Contact Us

Buy ‘Hope & Healing’ Today

Additional Books by Dr. Joseph Rosado

Buy Now

Buy Now
Buy Now
Buy Now
